analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba las dor ba nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i bsam gtan nam gzugs med pa 'am de 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa dang de dang ldan pas kyang 'thob po //
translated: Thus those free from attachment obtain the actual basis of absorption or formless states conducive to degeneration through falling from freedom from attachment and they obtain it through degeneration from freedom from attachment.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir yongs su nyams pa las nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'thob pas so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir yongs su nyams pa las nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'thob pas so //
translated: Therefore means because they obtain the factors conducive to degeneration through degeneration.

original: de bzhin du yongs su nyams pa dang skye bas zhes bya ba la /🔽dge ba yongs su nyams pas 'thob par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de bzhin du yongs su nyams pa dang skye bas zhes bya ba la / dge ba yongs su nyams pas 'thob par 'gyur la /
translated: So too, one obtains the first absorption through degeneration and through birth.🔽Does one obtain it through degeneration of virtue?🔽Does one obtain it through birth?

original: yongs su nyams pas 'dor bar 'gyur ba yod dam /🔽bsam gtan dag ba pa skye bas 'thob la /
analyzed: yongs su nyams pas 'dor bar 'gyur ba yod dam / bsam gtan dag ba pa skye bas 'thob la /
translated: Does one obtain it through birth?🔽One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.🔽One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.🔽One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.

original: skye bas 'dor ba yod dam zhen zhe'o //
analyzed: skye bas 'dor ba yod dam zhen zhe'o //
translated: One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.

original: tshangs pa'i 'jig @361b rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'jig @361b rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.🔽One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.🔽One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.🔽One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.

original: gang gi phyir tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i bsam gtan dang po nyon mongs pa dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i bsam gtan dang po nyon mongs pa dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.

original: de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du 'dor ba'i phyir ro //🔽de'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams nas yang de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du 'thob po //
analyzed: de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du 'dor ba'i phyir ro // de'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams nas yang de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du 'thob po //
translated: One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.🔽One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.🔽One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.🔽One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.

original: gang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten pa skye ba na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten pa skye ba na zhes bya ba la /
translated: One obtains it through birth in the Brahma realm.

original: nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pas gsum du yang bsam gtan dang po thob pa /
analyzed: nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pas gsum du yang bsam gtan dang po thob pa /
translated: The first absorption is also considered to be threefold:

original: de bzhin du khyad par med par brjod pa'i phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams la yang ji ltar rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khyad par med par brjod pa'i phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa rnams la yang ji ltar rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The second absorption and so on are also described in the same way, as appropriate.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo las ni gong du srid pa'i rtse mo skye ba na zhes bya ba med pas zag pa med pa nyid ni bsam gtan nam gzugs med pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba las te /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo las ni gong du srid pa'i rtse mo skye ba na zhes bya ba med pas zag pa med pa nyid ni bsam gtan nam gzugs med pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba las te /
translated: The summit of existence is uncontaminated anasrava because it is not stated that the summit of existence arises above bhava and it is free from attachment to the absorptions and formless states.

original: de dang mi ldan pa la 'thob po //
analyzed: de dang mi ldan pa la 'thob po //
translated: It is obtained by those not possessing it.

original: ldan pa las kyang zag pa med pa zad pa shes pa thob pa las mi slob pa ma thob pa thob po //
analyzed: ldan pa las kyang zag pa med pa zad pa shes pa thob pa las mi slob pa ma thob pa thob po //
translated: Also, it is obtained from possessing uncontaminated states, such as the knowledge of elimination.🔽It is obtained by those not previously possessing it.

original: dbang po 'thob las kyang dad pas mos pa zag pa med pa dang ldan pa kho na mthong bas thob par gyur nas slob pa sngar ma thob pa thob po //
analyzed: dbang po 'thob las kyang dad pas mos pa zag pa med pa dang ldan pa kho na mthong bas thob par gyur nas slob pa sngar ma thob pa thob po //
translated: It is obtained from obtaining the faculty, because one possessing the uncontaminated faculty of resolute faith who obtains the faculty of seeing obtains the state of a learner not previously obtained.

original: de bzhin dus kyis rnam par grol ba yang mi g-yo ba rtog pa na mi slob pa 'thob po //
analyzed: de bzhin dus kyis rnam par grol ba yang mi g-yo ba rtog pa na mi slob pa 'thob po //
translated: So too, one liberated according to circumstances also obtains the stage of no more learning when contemplating immutability.

original: nges pa 'jug pa las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: nges pa 'jug pa las zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The Autocommentary states:

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro bas kyang nges par 'jug pa na dang po nyid du zag pa med pa 'thob pa ma yin zhe na /🔽mthar gyis pa mi 'thob pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar ma yin te zhes bya ba ni mthar gyis pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa la brten nas nges pa la 'jug pas de bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi zag pa med pa mi 'thob po //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba sngon du 'gro bas kyang nges par 'jug pa na dang po nyid du zag pa med pa 'thob pa ma yin zhe na / mthar gyis pa mi 'thob pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar ma yin te zhes bya ba ni mthar gyis pa ni mi lcogs pa med pa la brten nas nges pa la 'jug pas de bsam gtan gyi dngos gzhi zag pa med pa mi 'thob po //
translated: “One who is a nonreturner liberated according to circumstances does not obtain the uncontaminated state for the first time when entering the state of definite separation from attachment.”🔽If one is a nonreturner who is liberated according to circumstances, one does not definitely obtain the uncontaminated state of the actual basis of absorption because one does not obtain the uncontaminated state of the actual basis of absorption.

original: 'phags pas ni gdon mi za bar 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob po //🔽yang na gdon mi za bar thob pa nyid de ltar bshad do //
analyzed: 'phags pas ni gdon mi za bar 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob po // yang na gdon mi za bar thob pa nyid de ltar bshad do //
translated: But if one is a nonreturner who is liberated according to circumstances, one definitely obtains the uncontaminated state of the actual basis of absorption when entering the state of definite separation from attachment.

original: nyon mongs can nyams skye ba yis //
analyzed: nyon mongs can nyams skye ba yis //
translated: Or it is explained that one definitely obtains the uncontaminated state of the actual basis of absorption when entering the state of definite separation from attachment.🔽Obtaining the uncontaminated state of the actual basis of absorption is explained in this way.🔽Obtaining the uncontaminated state of the actual basis of absorption is explained in this way.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan dang po de las 'dod chags dang bral ba las btang ba ni yang de las @362a * //🔽'dod chags dang bral ba yongs su nyams pa las 'thob po //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi bsam gtan dang po de las 'dod chags dang bral ba las btang ba ni yang de las @362a * // 'dod chags dang bral ba yongs su nyams pa las 'thob po //
translated: That is, one obtains the afflicted first absorption through complete degeneration from freedom from attachment to it.🔽One obtains the afflicted first absorption through complete degeneration from freedom from attachment to the afflicted first absorption.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa nas bsam gtan pa dang por skye na nyon mongs pa can gyi dang po 'thob po //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa nas bsam gtan pa dang por skye na nyon mongs pa can gyi dang po 'thob po //
translated: If one is born in the first absorption from the second absorption and so on, one obtains the afflicted first absorption.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ci rigs par brjod pa bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ci rigs par brjod pa bya'o //
translated: So too, one should understand the others as appropriate.

original: nyon mangs pa can gyi srid pa'i rtse mo ni de las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa kho na las 'thob kyi skye ba las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nyon mangs pa can gyi srid pa'i rtse mo ni de las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa kho na las 'thob kyi skye ba las ni ma yin no //
translated: One obtains the afflicted peak of existence through complete degeneration from freedom from attachment to it, but not through birth.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i zhes bya ba ni dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa'i zhes bya ba ni dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase “from the second and third absorptions” should be applied to pure and uncontaminated states.

original: zag pa med pa las nyon mongs pa can mi 'byung ste shin tu mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zag pa med pa las nyon mongs pa can mi 'byung ste shin tu mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: An afflicted state does not arise from an uncontaminated state because they are incompatible.

original: thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pa gcig rgal ba yin pas gsum pa'i gong ma ni mi skye'o //
analyzed: thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pa gcig rgal ba yin pas gsum pa'i gong ma ni mi skye'o //
translated: Since one skips over one meditative attainment of alternating meditative attainment, one does not generate the meditative attainment of the summit of existence.

original: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan gyi mjug thogs su yang rdzas bcu sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i mjug thogs dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mjug thogs su'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan gyi mjug thogs su yang rdzas bcu sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i mjug thogs dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi mjug thogs su'o //
translated: Ten substances are added after the other meditative stabilizations and formless states.

original: de'i rten dang dmigs pa 'og ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni chos shes 'dod pa'i khams la brten pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa'i phyir chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs med par snyoms par mi 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i rten dang dmigs pa 'og ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni chos shes 'dod pa'i khams la brten pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs pa'i phyir chos shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs med par snyoms par mi 'jug go //
translated: Because its basis and focal object are lower, one does not enter the formless meditative attainment immediately after Dharma knowledge because Dharma knowledge is based on the desire realm and focuses on the desire realm.

original: rten 'og ma nyid kyis gong mar mi skye bas de'i mjug thogs su gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: rten 'og ma nyid kyis gong mar mi skye bas de'i mjug thogs su gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: Because one does not generate the formless realm immediately after the summit of existence, one enters the formless meditative attainment immediately after the summit of existence.

original: 'og ma la dmigs pa nyid kyi 'dir mi skye'o //
analyzed: 'og ma la dmigs pa nyid kyi 'dir mi skye'o //
translated: Because it focuses on lower levels, one does not generate the formless realm here.

original: rjes su shes pa'i gnyi ga la brten pa dang khams gong ma la dmigs pas de 'dir skyes pa dag rjes su shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug pa mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: rjes su shes pa'i gnyi ga la brten pa dang khams gong ma la dmigs pas de 'dir skyes pa dag rjes su shes pa'i mjug thogs su gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug pa mi 'gal lo //
translated: It is not contradictory that those born here enter meditative attainment on the formless realm immediately after subsequent knowledge because they rely on both subsequent knowledge and they focus on higher realms.

original: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang //
translated: Also, affliction of one's level.

original: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po dag pa de'i mjug thogs su bdun skye ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po dag pa de'i mjug thogs su bdun skye ste /
translated: After pure first absorption, seven arise:

original: rang gis pa gsum po zag pa med pa dang / dag pa pa dang / nyon mongs can dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dag go //
analyzed: rang gis pa gsum po zag pa med pa dang / dag pa pa dang / nyon mongs can dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i sa pa dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dag go //
translated: the three of its level, which are uncontaminated, pure and afflicted, and the pure and uncontaminated of the second and third absorptions.

original: de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su brgyad do //
analyzed: de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su brgyad do //
translated: Similarly, eight arise after pure base of nothingness.

original: @362b bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mjug thogs su ni dgu'o //
analyzed: @362b bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mjug thogs su ni dgu'o //
translated: Nine arise after the second absorption.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi mjug thogs su ni bcu'o //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi mjug thogs su ni bcu'o //
translated: Ten arise after the base of infinite consciousness.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan gyi mjug thogs su ni bcu gcig go //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa gzhan gyi mjug thogs su ni bcu gcig go //
translated: Similarly, eleven arise immediately after the other meditative states of the formless realm.

original: zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su ni nyon mongs pa can skye ba med do zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jug pa dang shin tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro //🔽gzhan yang dag pa pa yang thams cad kyi mjug thogs su mi skye zhe na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su ni nyon mongs pa can skye ba med do zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jug pa dang shin tu 'gal ba'i phyir ro // gzhan yang dag pa pa yang thams cad kyi mjug thogs su mi skye zhe na /
translated: A defiled state does not arise immediately after a pure state, because it is in direct opposition to the arising of a pure state.🔽Also, a pure state does not arise immediately after any other state.

original: zag pa med pa la lta ci smos te /
analyzed: zag pa med pa la lta ci smos te /
translated: How much less could a pure state arise immediately after an uncontaminated state!

original: de skad du yang dag pa rnam pa bzhi zhes 'chad do //🔽rang gi sa pa'i dag pa pa dang nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni /🔽rang gi sa pa'i zag pa med pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de skad du yang dag pa rnam pa bzhi zhes 'chad do // rang gi sa pa'i dag pa pa dang nyon mongs pa can dag ces bya ba ni / rang gi sa pa'i zag pa med pa ma yin la /
translated: Thus, it is said that there are four types of pure states.

original: sa gong ma ba'i dag pa pa'am /🔽nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sa gong ma ba'i dag pa pa'am / nyon mongs pa can yang ma yin pa'o //
translated: A pure or defiled state of its own level

original: sa 'og ma pa ni dag pa pa gcig pu yin gyi /
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa ni dag pa pa gcig pu yin gyi /
translated: means that a pure or defiled state of the same level as the state in question arises immediately after it.🔽A pure or defiled state of a lower level does not arise immediately after it, because it is in direct opposition to the arising of a pure state.

original: nyon mongs pa can ma yin la zag pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can ma yin la zag pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: A pure or defiled state of a higher level does not arise immediately after it, because it is in direct opposition to the arising of a defiled state.🔽A pure state of a lower level does not arise immediately after it, because it is in direct opposition to the arising of a pure state.

original: nyon mongs pas gzir ba ni zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pas sa zil gyis mnan pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas gzir ba ni zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pas sa zil gyis mnan pa'o //
translated: Oppressed by affliction means afflicted by affliction.

original: dge ba las 'phos pa yin gyi zhes bya ba ni sdig pa byed pa ltan de de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba yin pas de ni dge ba kho na yin gyi nyon mongs pa can ni ma yin no //🔽zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su rnam pa thams cad du mi skye'o zhes bya ba ni rang gis pa ma yin la sa 'og ma pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dge ba las 'phos pa yin gyi zhes bya ba ni sdig pa byed pa ltan de de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba yin pas de ni dge ba kho na yin gyi nyon mongs pa can ni ma yin no // zag pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa can gyi mjug thogs su rnam pa thams cad du mi skye'o zhes bya ba ni rang gis pa ma yin la sa 'og ma pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is a wholesome state that has shifted from virtue means that when a person who has committed an evil action has right view, it is only wholesome and not afflicted.

original: 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Uncontaminated states never arise immediately after an afflicted state, nor do states of its level or a lower level arise means that states of its level do not arise and states of a lower level do not arise.🔽At the time of death means

original: 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i srid pa'i gnas skabs yin la /
analyzed: 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe zhes bya ba ni 'chi ba'i srid pa'i gnas skabs yin la /
translated: at the time of the state of death existence.

original: de yang ma nyam par gzhag pa yin pas de skye ba'i bsam gtan dag pa pa srid pa yod do //
analyzed: de yang ma nyam par gzhag pa yin pas de skye ba'i bsam gtan dag pa pa srid pa yod do //
translated: Since that state is not placed in equipoise, it is possible that pure absorption arises in that state.

original: bsam gtan dag tu skyes pa'i skye bas thob ba'i dge ba mnyam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de yang bsam gtan dag ba pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dag tu skyes pa'i skye bas thob ba'i dge ba mnyam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de yang bsam gtan dag ba pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Also, the virtuous minds obtained from birth that exist in the absorptions are called pure absorption minds.

original: de'i mjug thogs su rang dang gong ma dang 'og ma'i sa pa nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa nyon mongs pa can skye ste /
analyzed: de'i mjug thogs su rang dang gong ma dang 'og ma'i sa pa nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sems mnyam par gzhag pa nyon mongs pa can skye ste /
translated: Also, immediately after that, afflicted minds that link to the same level, higher levels, or lower levels arise.

original: dge ba'i sems kyis 'chi 'pho na 'gar yang nying mtshams sbyor ba la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //🔽de las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags dang ma bral ba @363a * //
analyzed: dge ba'i sems kyis 'chi 'pho na 'gar yang nying mtshams sbyor ba la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro // de las 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags dang ma bral ba @363a * //
translated: This is because when dying from a virtuous mind, there is no obstruction to linking with any level.🔽Since those who are free from attachment and those who are not free from attachment engage in virtuous minds,

original: dag gis dge ba'i sems kun tu spyod par 'gyur bas de'i phyir skye bas thob pa'i dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su thams cad pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dag gis dge ba'i sems kun tu spyod par 'gyur bas de'i phyir skye bas thob pa'i dag pa pa'i mjug thogs su thams cad pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: immediately after the pure mind obtained from birth, all afflicted minds arise.

original: sa gong ma pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni sa 'og ma'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams sngar bskyed pa des rang gi sa las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa gong ma pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni sa 'og ma'i 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams sngar bskyed pa des rang gi sa las 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Those of the higher level are not generated, because those who are free from attachment to the lower level have already generated them.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo ni rnam pa gsum yin te /🔽khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so zhes bya ba la srid ba'i rtse mo na ni mthong ba'i lam dang mthun pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs pa /
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo ni rnam pa gsum yin te / khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs so zhes bya ba la srid ba'i rtse mo na ni mthong ba'i lam dang mthun pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs pa /
translated: The summit of existence has three types.🔽The summit of existence has three types of uncontaminated states:🔽the factors conducive to penetrative insight, the factors conducive to insight, and the factors conducive to final nirvāṇa.🔽The summit of existence is not associated with the factors conducive to penetrative insight that are associated with the path of seeing,

original: zag pa med pa dang mthun pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa yod kyi khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa ni ma yin te gong nas gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zag pa med pa dang mthun pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa yod kyi khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa ni ma yin te gong nas gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: but it is associated with the factors conducive to penetrative insight that are associated with the uncontaminated states.

original: nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni nyon mongs pa skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni nyon mongs pa skye ba dang rjes su mthun pa'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The factors conducive to degeneration are compatible with the generation of affliction.

original: de las nyon mongs pa can gdon mi za bar skye ba ni ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: de las nyon mongs pa can gdon mi za bar skye ba ni ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is not that affliction definitely arises from them.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same applies to the other stages.

original: gzhan dag na re /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re /
translated: Others say:

original: gang du gnas pa yongs su nyams pa de nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa yin gyi gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang du gnas pa yongs su nyams pa de nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa yin gyi gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma yin no //
translated: The stage of abiding is the stage of decline, not the stage of stability.

original: gang du gnas pa mi nyams shing 'phel ba ma yin pa ni khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa'o //
analyzed: gang du gnas pa mi nyams shing 'phel ba ma yin pa ni khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa'o //
translated: The stage of neither decline nor progress is the stage of distinction.

original: gang du khyad par gzhan yin pas nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ste /
analyzed: gang du khyad par gzhan yin pas nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ste /
translated: The stage of distinction is the stage of the factors conducive to penetrative insight.

original: gang gi mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam la mngon du phyogs par byed pa'o zhes zer te /🔽gzhan dag na re dben pa nges par 'byed ba'i cha dang mthun pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi mjug thogs su 'phags pa'i lam la mngon du phyogs par byed pa'o zhes zer te / gzhan dag na re dben pa nges par 'byed ba'i cha dang mthun pa ste /
translated: The stage of penetrative insight is the stage of the ārya path.

original: gang gi mjug thogs nges pa la 'jug pa'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gang gi mjug thogs nges pa la 'jug pa'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: The stage of seclusion is the stage of the factors conducive to penetrative insight.🔽The stage of definite entry is the stage of penetrative insight.

original: khyad par 'di ni gang 'ga' zhig 'phags pa'i lam mngon du phyogs par byed pa 'di dag thams cad nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o //
analyzed: khyad par 'di ni gang 'ga' zhig 'phags pa'i lam mngon du phyogs par byed pa 'di dag thams cad nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o //
translated: This is the distinction. All those who are directed to the ārya path are conducive to penetrative insight.

original: gang gi phyir cig shos mjug thogs nyid na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir cig shos mjug thogs nyid na /
translated: Because the other is immediately subsequent to it.🔽

original: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog kho na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog kho na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the latter, i.e., the supreme mundane factors, are immediately followed by the factors conducive to penetration.

original: gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa las 'das pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa las 'das pa ma yin te /
translated: The supreme mundane factors are not beyond the factors conducive to the station of neither-perception-nor-non-perception.

original: de'i phyir khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa skye ba de ni gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa skye ba de ni gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the arising of the factors conducive to distinction is dependent on the factors conducive to the station of neither-perception-nor-non-perception.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang @363b ji ltar srid pa bzhin brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang @363b ji ltar srid pa bzhin brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same should be said for the others, as is appropriate.

original: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni de gcig bu skye'o zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa kho na'o //
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i mjug thogs su ni de gcig bu skye'o zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa kho na'o //
translated: Immediately after the factors conducive to penetration, only that arises, i.e., the factors conducive to penetration alone.

original: gzhan dag na re khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa yang skye'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re khyad par gyi cha dang mthun pa yang skye'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that the factors conducive to distinction also arise.

original: zag pa med pa las ldang ba'i tshe dag pa pa gang mngon sum du byed ce na /
analyzed: zag pa med pa las ldang ba'i tshe dag pa pa gang mngon sum du byed ce na /
translated: When emerging from the uncontaminated, which pure factors are manifested?

original: nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs pa rnam pa gsum ka yang ngo zhes kha cig zer ro //
analyzed: nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa ma gtogs pa rnam pa gsum ka yang ngo zhes kha cig zer ro //
translated: Some say: All three, except for the one conducive to regression.

original: gzhan dag na re khyad par du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa kho na'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re khyad par du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa kho na'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: Only the one definitely conducive to penetration.

original: thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa la ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa kho na ste bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa la ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa kho na ste bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In skipping over meditative attainment, only the one conducive to penetration is taught.🔽Because of being without affliction and because of mastery of concentration.

original: nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir dang / ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa ni dgra bcom pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir dang / ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa ni dgra bcom pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of being without affliction, one is an arhat.

original: ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la dbang ba ni dus dang mi sbyor bar rnam par grol ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of mastery of concentration, one is liberated regardless of circumstances.

original: de yang nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar gyi mtha' thob pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de yang nyon mongs pa med pa dang smon nas shes pa dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar gyi mtha' thob pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Moreover, one is without affliction, possesses knowledge through prayer, and obtains the end of the fourth meditative stabilization.

original: de bzhin du lhag ma rnams kyang rang gi sa dang sa 'og mar zhes bya ba ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched zag pa dang bcas pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo ma gtogs pa sa brgyad la brten no //
analyzed: de bzhin du lhag ma rnams kyang rang gi sa dang sa 'og mar zhes bya ba ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched zag pa dang bcas pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo ma gtogs pa sa brgyad la brten no //
translated: The contaminated base of infinite consciousness is supported by eight levels, excluding the summit of existence.🔽The contaminated and uncontaminated base of infinite space are supported by seven levels, up to the first absorption.

original: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa sa bdun la brten pa nas bsam gtan dang po zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan dang po la brten pa'i bar yin no //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa sa bdun la brten pa nas bsam gtan dang po zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan dang po la brten pa'i bar yin no //
translated: The contaminated and uncontaminated first absorption are supported by the desire realm and the first absorption.🔽Because it does not exist on its level and because it is close.

original: rang gi med pa'i phyir dang de yang nye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i lam med par dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa med la /
analyzed: rang gi med pa'i phyir dang de yang nye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i lam med par dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa med la /
translated: That is, without the uncontaminated path, there is no attainment of the state of an arhat.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo ba'i zag pa med pa yang med pas der skyes pa dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa gang yin pa des lam 'og ma mngon sum du byed pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo ba'i zag pa med pa yang med pas der skyes pa dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa gang yin pa des lam 'og ma mngon sum du byed pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: Since the uncontaminated state of the summit of existence does not exist, there is no fault in those born there who attain the state of an arhat manifesting the lower path.

original: de la ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyis pa kho na mngon sum du byed kyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyis pa kho na mngon sum du byed kyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: One manifests only the base of nothingness, not the others,

original: de thag nye ba'i phyir te goms par byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽de ltar srid pa'i rtse mo bzhin ci yang med pa'i skye mched zag pa med pa yang sa dgu @364a * //
analyzed: de thag nye ba'i phyir te goms par byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // de ltar srid pa'i rtse mo bzhin ci yang med pa'i skye mched zag pa med pa yang sa dgu @364a * //
translated: because it is proximate, that is, because one has cultivated it.

original: la brten pa yin no //
analyzed: la brten pa yin no //
translated: Just as the summit of existence is nine levels, so too the uncontaminated base of nothingness is nine levels.

original: srid pa smos pas ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po bzung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: srid pa smos pas ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po bzung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The term existence refers to contaminated things.

original: mdo las srid pa'i chos rnams zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdo las srid pa'i chos rnams zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because a sūtra states:🔽The phenomena of existence are the five aggregates.🔽Because they are completely cut off by craving,

original: sred pas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sred pa ni rang gi sa pa'i sa'i dmigs pa las nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sred pas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sred pa ni rang gi sa pa'i sa'i dmigs pa las nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because craving is definitely connected to its own level.

original: de nyid kyi sa yongs su gcod de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi sa yongs su gcod de /
translated: That very level is completely cut off.

original: dper na gad la 'dod pa'i sred pa rgyas par 'gyur ba de ni 'dod pa'i khams so zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gad la 'dod pa'i sred pa rgyas par 'gyur ba de ni 'dod pa'i khams so zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the desire realm is where the craving of the desire realm increases.

original: dge ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zag pa med pa la yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la zag pa med pa la dmigs pa ni sred pa yin par mi rigs te spang bya'i phyir zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dge ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zag pa med pa la yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la zag pa med pa la dmigs pa ni sred pa yin par mi rigs te spang bya'i phyir zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Craving that focuses on uncontaminated states is not tenable, because it is said that it is abandoned.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yin gyis sred pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yin gyis sred pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore this is aspiration for virtuous Dharmas, but it is not craving.

original: gzugs med dngos gzhi zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzugs med dngos gzhi zhes bya ba la /
translated: The formless realm is the actual basis.

original: srid pa smos pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po la dmigs pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: srid pa smos pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i dngos po la dmigs pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Since existence is mentioned, it is said to focus on contaminated states.

original: sa 'og ma rab tu ma zhi ba yin pa'i phyir dang / de dag shin tu rab tu ma zhi ba yin pa'i phyir te /🔽de nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa las 'das pas gzugs med pa las rnam pa thams cad du 'das pa zhes bshad kyi bsam gtan la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sa 'og ma rab tu ma zhi ba yin pa'i phyir dang / de dag shin tu rab tu ma zhi ba yin pa'i phyir te / de nyid kyi phyir dmigs pa las 'das pas gzugs med pa las rnam pa thams cad du 'das pa zhes bshad kyi bsam gtan la ni ma yin te /
translated: Because lower levels are not fully pacified and because those formless states are extremely not fully pacified.

original: bsam gtan dag ni dmigs pa las 'da' ba med pas kun nas lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan dag ni dmigs pa las 'da' ba med pas kun nas lta ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore it is explained that it completely transcends the formless realm, but it does not transcend the absorptions, because the absorptions are not fully pacified since they are not transcendent.

original: dmigs pa zag pa med pa ni rang gi sa dang sa gong ma pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi sa 'og ma pa yang yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa zag pa med pa ni rang gi sa dang sa gong ma pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi sa 'og ma pa yang yin no //
translated: Uncontaminated objects are not only of one's own level and higher levels, they are also of lower levels.

original: de yang chos dang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang ma thun pa rnam pa gnyis yin pas de'i phyir rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa thams cad ces bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de yang chos dang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang ma thun pa rnam pa gnyis yin pas de'i phyir rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa thams cad ces bya ba smos so //
translated: Moreover, since they are of two types: the aspects of Dharma knowledge and subsequent knowledge, therefore it says all that is compatible with the path of subsequent knowledge.

original: rang gi gnyen po la dmigs pa'i phyir rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam kho na de dag gi dmigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rang gi gnyen po la dmigs pa'i phyir rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i lam kho na de dag gi dmigs pa yin gyi /
translated: The path compatible with the path of subsequent knowledge is the focal object of those two because it focuses on its own antidote.

original: chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa ni ma yin no ;
analyzed: chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa ni ma yin no ;
translated: The path compatible with Dharma knowledge is not.🔽Isn't it the case that some of the path compatible with Dharma knowledge is an antidote?

original: / chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa yang 'ga' zhig gnyen po ma yin nam zhe na yin mod kyi thams cad kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: / chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa yang 'ga' zhig gnyen po ma yin nam zhe na yin mod kyi thams cad kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: It is, but not all of it is.

original: dmigs pa zag pa med pa ni zhes khyad par med pa smos pas sa 'og ma'i 'gog pa la yang thal bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir sa 'og ma'i sa @364b 'gog pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba smos te dgag bya'i sgo nas de la dmigs pa'i
analyzed: dmigs pa zag pa med pa ni zhes khyad par med pa smos pas sa 'og ma'i 'gog pa la yang thal bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir sa 'og ma'i sa @364b 'gog pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba smos te dgag bya'i sgo nas de la dmigs pa'i
translated: Since it is said that the focal object is uncontaminated without making any distinction, it would follow that the focal object of the uninterrupted path of the first absorption is the cessation of lower levels.🔽Therefore the Abhidharmakosa notes, It does not focus on the cessation of lower levels, because it focuses on the object of cessation through the process of negation.

original: phyir ro // dngos gzhi bkag pas nyer bsdogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: phyir ro // dngos gzhi bkag pas nyer bsdogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: Since the actual basis is negated, the Abhidharmakosa notes, The focal object of the uninterrupted paths of access concentration is the lower level.

original: nyer bsdogs dag gi bar chad med pa'i lam gang dag yin pa de dag gi dmigs pa ni sa 'og ma yin no //
analyzed: nyer bsdogs dag gi bar chad med pa'i lam gang dag yin pa de dag gi dmigs pa ni sa 'og ma yin no //
translated: The focal object of the uninterrupted paths of access concentration is the lower level.

original: de la nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi dmigs pa bsam gtan bzhi pa yin la srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyer bsdogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched yin pa'i bar
analyzed: de la nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi dmigs pa bsam gtan bzhi pa yin la srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyer bsdogs kyi bar chad med pa'i lam rnams kyi ni ci yang med pa'i skye mched yin pa'i bar
translated: The focal object of the uninterrupted paths of access concentration to the base of infinite space is the fourth absorption and the focal object of the uninterrupted paths of access concentration to the summit of existence is the base of nothingness.

original: du'o // rnam pa gsum po 'di dag las zhes bya ba ni dag ba pa dang zag pa med pa dang nyon mongs pa can rnams so //
analyzed: du'o // rnam pa gsum po 'di dag las zhes bya ba ni dag ba pa dang zag pa med pa dang nyon mongs pa can rnams so //
translated: means from among the pure, uncontaminated, and afflicted.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba ni /
translated: What need is there to mention afflicted?

original: rang nyid dri ma can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid dri ma can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is itself a stain.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'og ma yang ma yin la zhes bya ba la /🔽bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi dag pa pas sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams mi spong ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'og ma yang ma yin la zhes bya ba la / bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi dag pa pas sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams mi spong ste /
translated: It is not lower because one is free from attachment to it.

original: de las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ro //🔽de nyid de'i gnyen po ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi sa na yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: de las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ro // de nyid de'i gnyen po ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi sa na yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la ;
translated: The pure actual bases of the absorptions and formless realm do not abandon the afflictions of lower levels because one is free from attachment to them.🔽They do not exist on their own level because they are not antidotes to it.

original: de nyid de'i gnyen po yin par ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de nyid de'i gnyen po yin par ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is illogical that they are antidotes to it.

original: srog chags thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par thal ba'i phyir dang / de'i nyon mongs pa dag gis gcig tu 'ching ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srog chags thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par thal ba'i phyir dang / de'i nyon mongs pa dag gis gcig tu 'ching ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that all sentient beings would be without affliction, and because they are bound by their afflictions.

original: ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir gong ma yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir gong ma yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is not higher, because it is superior.

original: dman bas khyad par du 'phags pa spong ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: dman bas khyad par du 'phags pa spong ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not logical to abandon what is superior to what is inferior.

original: de lta ma yin na 'dod pa'i khams kyis kyang bsam gtan dang po spong bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na 'dod pa'i khams kyis kyang bsam gtan dang po spong bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were, then it would follow that the first absorption would abandon the desire realm.

original: sa 'og ma'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa 'og ma'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it is the antidote to the lower level.

original: des sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur bas na sa 'og ma'i gnyen po'o //
analyzed: des sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur bas na sa 'og ma'i gnyen po'o //
translated: It is the antidote to the lower level because it is free from attachment to the lower level.

original: 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i dngos gzhi mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: Engagement refers to manifesting the actual basis of the absorptions and formless states.

original: ci de dag kyang rnam pa gsum yin la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ci de dag kyang rnam pa gsum yin la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Do they also have three types?

original: dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dang nyon mongs pa can no //
analyzed: dag pa pa dang zag pa med pa dang nyon mongs pa can no //
translated: They are pure, uncontaminated and afflicted.

original: de dag la tshor ba yang @365a * //🔽de dang 'dra bar yod dam zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag la tshor ba yang @365a * // de dang 'dra bar yod dam zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Do they also have feeling?🔽Do they have joy, pleasure, or equanimity?🔽They have equanimity because they are the path of no more learning.

original: bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs na dga' ba dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i nyer bsdogs na bde ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nyer bsdogs na btang snyoms yod dam zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs na dga' ba dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i nyer bsdogs na bde ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nyer bsdogs na btang snyoms yod dam zhes bya ba'o //
translated: They have the faculty of equanimity because they are the path of no more learning.

original: 'bad de drang bar bya ba'i phyir btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang ldan pa yin te /🔽mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir dga' ba dang bde ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin gyi 'bad de drang bar bya ba ni ma yin /
analyzed: 'bad de drang bar bya ba'i phyir btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang ldan pa yin te / mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir dga' ba dang bde ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin gyi 'bad de drang bar bya ba ni ma yin /
translated: They have the faculty of equanimity because they are the path of no more learning.🔽They have the faculty of equanimity because they are the path of no more learning.🔽They have the faculty of equanimity because they are the path of no more learning.🔽They have the faculty of equanimity because they are the path of no more learning.

original: sa 'og ma las kyang byung ba dang ma bral ba'i phyir yang dga' ba dang bde ba med pas btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: sa 'og ma las kyang byung ba dang ma bral ba'i phyir yang dga' ba dang bde ba med pas btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no //
translated: They have the faculty of equanimity because they are the path of no more learning.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They have the faculty of equanimity because they are the path of no more learning.

original: myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not associated with relishing.

original: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam nyid du mi rung ngo //
analyzed: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam nyid du mi rung ngo //
translated: It is not suitable to be the path of freedom from attachment.

original: sred pa dang bcad pas ni nyon mongs pa spong ba byed nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sred pa dang bcad pas ni nyon mongs pa spong ba byed nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not able to abandon the defilements through cutting off craving.

original: dang po 'phags pa'ang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dang po 'phags pa'ang zhes bya ba la /
translated: The first noble ones.

original: des ni rang gis pas kyang yid 'byung ba dang ldan pas zag pa med pa yin no zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: des ni rang gis pas kyang yid 'byung ba dang ldan pas zag pa med pa yin no zhes kha cig go //
translated: Some say: It is uncontaminated because it possesses renunciation through its own power.

original: kha cig na re sa de las nye bar 'tshe ba mang du 'byung ste 'dod pa'i khams dang nye ba'i phyir dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun tu rtogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir dang kun tu rtogs pa rnams kyang de la rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro zhes
analyzed: kha cig na re sa de las nye bar 'tshe ba mang du 'byung ste 'dod pa'i khams dang nye ba'i phyir dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi kun tu rtogs pa 'byung ba'i phyir dang kun tu rtogs pa rnams kyang de la rjes su 'brel pa'i phyir ro zhes
translated: Some say: There is much harm in that stage because it is close to the desire realm, conceptualization of attachment to the desire realm arises, and conceptualization is related to it.

original: zer ro // gzhan dag na re /
analyzed: zer ro // gzhan dag na re /
translated: Others say:

original: bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid las rang gi sa dang bcas pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ni lam sla bas 'thob po //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid las rang gi sa dang bcas pa las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ni lam sla bas 'thob po //
translated: The first absorption and so on are obtained by the easy path of freedom from attachment to one's level and higher levels.

original: de bor nas lam dka' bas nges par 'byung ngo zhes rigs so //
analyzed: de bor nas lam dka' bas nges par 'byung ngo zhes rigs so //
translated: It is logical that one who discards that and definitely emerges by the difficult path of the first absorption and so on is a nonreturner.

original: de'i phyir zag pa med pa rnams bdun ma yin zhes bya bar nges so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zag pa med pa rnams bdun ma yin zhes bya bar nges so //
translated: Therefore it is ascertained that uncontaminated states are not seven.

original: dang po ni gzhan la brten pa srid bas zag pa med par yang 'gyur pas na skyon med do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: dang po ni gzhan la brten pa srid bas zag pa med par yang 'gyur pas na skyon med do zhes zer ro //
translated: The first is not erroneous because it is possible that uncontaminated states arise in dependence on others.

original: 'o na bye brag tu bshad pa las nyer bsdogs kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i sems dang sems su 'gyur ro zhes gang bshad pa de ji ltar /
analyzed: 'o na bye brag tu bshad pa las nyer bsdogs kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i sems dang sems su 'gyur ro zhes gang bshad pa de ji ltar /
translated: If that is so, then how do you interpret the Abhidharmakośa statement, The mind of entry to access concentration is a mind?🔽Since minds not concomitant with affliction do not link with minds, it would follow that access concentrations would be concomitant with enjoyment.

original: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa sems la mtshams sbyor ba med pas @365b nyer bsdogs rnams ro myang ba dang mtshungs bar ldan par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na de ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa sems la mtshams sbyor ba med pas @365b nyer bsdogs rnams ro myang ba dang mtshungs bar ldan par thal bar 'gyur ro zhe na de ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: de rnams la ni mnyam par gzhag pa la nyon mongs pa bkag go //
analyzed: de rnams la ni mnyam par gzhag pa la nyon mongs pa bkag go //
translated: In those, affliction is blocked in equipoise,

original: skye ba la nyon mongs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skye ba la nyon mongs pa ma yin no //
translated: but not in arising.

original: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa'i phyir nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, he says, “The mind of access concentration...

original: kha cig gsum zhes bya ba ni ro myang ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha cig gsum zhes bya ba ni ro myang ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Some say three, because there is meditative stabilization that relishes.

original: don tha dad pa yin te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la nyer bsdogs rnams ni dngos gzhi la 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don tha dad pa yin te zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la nyer bsdogs rnams ni dngos gzhi la 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning is different, because the access concentrations are the cause for entering the actual basis.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because there is no distinction,

original: ji ltar bsam gtan dang po na la lan rtog pa dang da phyod pa yod pa /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan dang po na la lan rtog pa dang da phyod pa yod pa /
translated: just as in the first absorption, some have investigation and analysis,

original: la la na dpyod pa kho na yod pa de ltar gnyis pa la sogs pa dag la ma yin pas der bsam gtan khyad par can ma brjod do //
analyzed: la la na dpyod pa kho na yod pa de ltar gnyis pa la sogs pa dag la ma yin pas der bsam gtan khyad par can ma brjod do //
translated: and some have analysis alone, it is not like that in the second absorption and so on. Therefore, special absorption is not mentioned there.

original: yang rtog pa dang dpyod pa las 'das pa'i phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa dang dpyod pa las ma 'das shing rtog pa nye bar zhi ba ni bsam gtan khyad par can no //
analyzed: yang rtog pa dang dpyod pa las 'das pa'i phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa dang dpyod pa las ma 'das shing rtog pa nye bar zhi ba ni bsam gtan khyad par can no //
translated: Moreover, the second meditation is beyond investigation and analysis, and the special meditation is beyond analysis but not beyond investigation.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni khyad par can mi rigs te /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni khyad par can mi rigs te /
translated: The special meditation is not reasonable in the second meditation, etc.,

original: dga' ba bkag pa la 'gog par bya ba gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dga' ba bkag pa la 'gog par bya ba gzhan ma yin no //
translated: because joy is stopped and there is no other fault to be stopped.

original: de yod pa mtshan nyid las 'das pa'i phyir bsam gtan gsum pa nyid dang gsum pa la yang bde ba las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir bzhi pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de yod pa mtshan nyid las 'das pa'i phyir bsam gtan gsum pa nyid dang gsum pa la yang bde ba las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir bzhi pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Since it is beyond the characteristic of existence, it should be called the third meditation. Since it is beyond the characteristic of pleasure, it should be called the fourth.

original: ji ltar dang po la rtog pa tsam skyon du bstan pa de nyid kyi de tsam las 'das pa'i phyir de khyad par can nyid de cig shos ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dang po la rtog pa tsam skyon du bstan pa de nyid kyi de tsam las 'das pa'i phyir de khyad par can nyid de cig shos ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: Just as mere investigation is taught as a fault in the first meditation, the special meditation is beyond mere investigation, but not the other.

original: lam gang gis sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs la ma brten par dga' ba dang bde ba 'gog pa thob pa de khyad par can nyid kyi phyir de'i mjug thogs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lam gang gis sa gong ma'i nyer bsdogs la ma brten par dga' ba dang bde ba 'gog pa thob pa de khyad par can nyid kyi phyir de'i mjug thogs su 'gyur ro //
translated: The special meditative attainment of cessation is the meditative attainment that is obtained by a path that does not depend on the access concentration to the higher stage, because it is the cessation of joy and pleasure.

original: 'o na mdo las mdun kho na la brten par gsungs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'o na mdo las mdun kho na la brten par gsungs pa ma yin no //
translated: But isn’t it said in the sutras that it is supported on the prior stage?

original: ci'i phyir mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dag dmigs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi lcogs pa med pa dang bsam gtan khyad par can dag dmigs she na /
translated: Why are the unrestricted states and the special meditative attainment of the fourth absorption mentioned?

original: mdo las mi lcogs pa med pa kho na re zhig ma gtogs par bshad do //
analyzed: mdo las mi lcogs pa med pa kho na re zhig ma gtogs par bshad do //
translated: The sutras explain that the unrestricted states are excluded from the first absorption and so on.

original: bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa kho na nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa kho na nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa ma yin gyi /
translated: One does not abide in the first absorption and so on,

original: shes rab kyis lta ba'i zag pa yongs su @366a * //🔽zad par gyur pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: shes rab kyis lta ba'i zag pa yongs su @366a * // zad par gyur pa'o zhes so //
translated: but one completely exhausts the contaminants of view through wisdom.

original: rtog pa dang bcas pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan pa'i phyir bsam gtan khyad par can dmigs so //
analyzed: rtog pa dang bcas pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan pa'i phyir bsam gtan khyad par can dmigs so //
translated: The special meditative attainment of the fourth absorption is mentioned in order to teach the three meditative attainments that possess investigation and analysis and so on.

original: bsam gtan dang po ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'o zhes gsungs shing /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'o zhes gsungs shing /
translated: The first absorption is associated with investigation and analysis.

original: gnyis pa ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa nye bar zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa nye bar zhi ba'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The second absorption is the pacification of investigation and analysis.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa ni rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa ni rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
translated: The second absorption and so on are concentration that is free of investigation and analysis.

original: de ni rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam gyi skabs ci zhe na /
analyzed: de ni rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam gyi skabs ci zhe na /
translated: What is the context of concentration that is free of investigation but possesses analysis?

original: bsam gtan khyad par can gyi gnas skabs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan khyad par can gyi gnas skabs su 'gyur ro //
translated: It is the context of the special absorption.

original: tshangs pa chen po bdag por rgyu ci snyam du 'gyur pa las /
analyzed: tshangs pa chen po bdag por rgyu ci snyam du 'gyur pa las /
translated: What is the cause of being the lord of Mahabrahma?

original: gzhan du ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las bsam gtan gyi khyad par yang yod do zhes so //
analyzed: gzhan du ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las bsam gtan gyi khyad par yang yod do zhes so //
translated: Elsewhere, the special absorption is distinguished by the special concentration.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis na gang mi lcogs pa med pa las bsam gtan khyad par can der ma gsungs pa ni de bsam gtan dang pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis na gang mi lcogs pa med pa las bsam gtan khyad par can der ma gsungs pa ni de bsam gtan dang pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The Bhagavan did not state that the special absorption is from unrestricted access concentration because it is subsumed by the first absorption.

original: bsam gtan dang po smos pas de nyid smos so zhes bya ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po smos pas de nyid smos so zhes bya ste /
translated: The first absorption is stated because it is stated in that context.

original: gang 'di bsam gtan dang po'i nyer bsdogs mi lcogs pa med pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: gang 'di bsam gtan dang po'i nyer bsdogs mi lcogs pa med pa zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called the unrestricted access concentration to the first meditative absorption.

original: de nyer bsngogs kyi khyad par gyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyer bsngogs kyi khyad par gyi phyir ro //
translated: It is called this because it is a special access concentration.

original: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dis mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa thams cad mi lcogs pa med pas na mi lcogs pa med pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro ;
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re 'dis mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa thams cad mi lcogs pa med pas na mi lcogs pa med pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro ;
translated: Vaibhasikas say: It is called unrestricted access because it is unrestricted access to all the levels of meditative equipoise.🔽The unrestricted access concentration is the domain of the actual basis of the first absorption.

original: / mi lcogs pa med pa dngos gzhi'i sa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa mngon du ma byas par zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / mi lcogs pa med pa dngos gzhi'i sa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa mngon du ma byas par zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase not actualizing the unrestricted access concentration means not actualizing the unrestricted access concentration.

original: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase associated with enjoyment means

original: gang gi phyir de skye ba'i gnas yin pa de'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de skye ba'i gnas yin pa de'o //
translated: that it is the abode of birth for those who enjoy it.

original: de la ro myang ba ni tshangs pa der skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la ro myang ba ni tshangs pa der skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those who enjoy it are Brahmas born there.

original: dngos gzhi'i sa la sred pa kho na de ro myang ba ste ;
analyzed: dngos gzhi'i sa la sred pa kho na de ro myang ba ste ;
translated: Craving for the level of the actual basis is enjoyment.

original: ro myang ba'i khyad par bzhin de la ro myang ba'i khyad par la rag las pa sgrub par nus pa med do //
analyzed: ro myang ba'i khyad par bzhin de la ro myang ba'i khyad par la rag las pa sgrub par nus pa med do //
translated: The distinction of relishing is not established as dependent on the distinction of relishing, because it is not possible to establish that.

original: de bde min sdug min zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bde min sdug min zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is neither pleasure nor pain.

original: de na rnam par shes pa'i tshegs gsum med pa'i phyir bde ba med la /
analyzed: de na rnam par shes pa'i tshegs gsum med pa'i phyir bde ba med la /
translated: There is no pleasure there because the three sensations are absent.

original: zhi gnas dman pa nyid kyis mngon par 'du @366b byed pa dang bcas pas drang ba dag ma yin pa'i phyir dga' ba med do //
analyzed: zhi gnas dman pa nyid kyis mngon par 'du @366b byed pa dang bcas pas drang ba dag ma yin pa'i phyir dga' ba med do //
translated: There is no joy because it is accompanied by the formation of manifest effort due to the inferiority of serenity.

original: de nyid kyi phyir lam dka' ba yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir lam dka' ba yin te /
translated: For that very reason, the path is difficult.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not pain or mental pain because it is free from attachment.

original: de'i phyir sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa nyid de zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa nyid de zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said to be associated with the sensation that is neither pleasure nor pain.

original: yul lnga zhes bya ba ni yul rnams shin tu 'phrog par byed pa nyid yin pas de ltar dbang po rnams ma yin pas yul smos so //
analyzed: yul lnga zhes bya ba ni yul rnams shin tu 'phrog par byed pa nyid yin pas de ltar dbang po rnams ma yin pas yul smos so //
translated: The five objects are mentioned because the objects are extremely captivating, not the faculties.

original: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang rga ba dang mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: The three characteristics of conditioned states are origination, senescence, and desinence.

original: gzhan dag na re mtshan ma'i sgra ni rgyu'i rnam grangs te /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re mtshan ma'i sgra ni rgyu'i rnam grangs te /
translated: Others say that the term “sign” is a synonym for cause.

original: 'di la yul chos mtshan ma med cing rgyu med pa yod pas na mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'di la yul chos mtshan ma med cing rgyu med pa yod pas na mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Since this has no object, no cause, it is called “signless.”

original: gzhan dag na re dus kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir na mya ngan las 'das pa mtshan ma med pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re dus kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir na mya ngan las 'das pa mtshan ma med pa yin la /
translated: Others say that nirvana is signless because it is free from the signs of time.

original: de'i yul can gyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de'i yul can gyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan ma med pa'o zhes zer ro //
translated: The concentration whose object is that is called “signless.”🔽The emptiness of emptiness is the emptiness of the emptiness of the reality realm.🔽The emptiness of the reality realm is the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: stong nyid bdag med stong nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: stong nyid bdag med stong nyid du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.

original: gang gi phyir ting nge 'dzin bdag med pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa can yin pa de nyid kyi phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i gnyen po nye ba yin te /🔽'jig tshogs la lta ba yang rnam pa gnyis pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ting nge 'dzin bdag med pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa can yin pa de nyid kyi phyir 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i gnyen po nye ba yin te /🔽'jig tshogs la lta ba yang rnam pa gnyis pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned is the emptiness of the five aggregates.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned is the emptiness of space, analytical cessation, and nonanalytical cessation.🔽The emptiness of

original: 'di ltar bdag med pa'i rnam pa ni bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag med pa'i rnam pa ni bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po yin la /
translated: Thus, the aspect of selflessness is the antidote to the view of self.

original: stong pa'i rnam pa ni bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po yin no //
analyzed: stong pa'i rnam pa ni bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po yin no //
translated: The aspect of emptiness is the antidote to the view of mine.

original: 'dir ji ltar chos de bdag med pa'i rnam pa de ltar med pa'i rnam pa dang / ji ltar bdag med pa'i rnam pa de ltar stong pa'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir ji ltar chos de bdag med pa'i rnam pa de ltar med pa'i rnam pa dang / ji ltar bdag med pa'i rnam pa de ltar stong pa'i rnam pa'o //
translated: Here, the aspect of nonexistence is like the aspect of selflessness of that dharma. The aspect of emptiness is like the aspect of selflessness.🔽It is associated with the remaining aspects of the truths.

original: bden pa'i rnam pa lhag ma dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag dang 'gog pa'i rnam pa rnams las gzhan pa bden pa'i rnam pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge
analyzed: bden pa'i rnam pa lhag ma dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'o zhes bya ba ni stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam pa dag dang 'gog pa'i rnam pa rnams las gzhan pa bden pa'i rnam pa gang dag yin pa de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge
translated: The remaining aspects of the truths are associated with the concentration that is associated with the aspects of emptiness and selflessness and the aspect of cessation.

original: 'dzin te / rnam pa bcu pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa ste gnyis dang / kun 'byung ba dang lam re re la rnam bzhi bzhi'o //
analyzed: 'dzin te / rnam pa bcu pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa ste gnyis dang / kun 'byung ba dang lam re re la rnam bzhi bzhi'o //
translated: The ten aspects are the two aspects of impermanence and suffering, and the four aspects of each of the truths of origin and path.

original: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang de'i rgyu dag gis yid 'byung ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa dang sdug @367a * //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang de'i rgyu dag gis yid 'byung ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa dang sdug @367a * //
translated: Because one turns away from impermanence, suffering, and its cause.

original: bsngal ba de'i rgyu kun 'byung ni /
analyzed: bsngal ba de'i rgyu kun 'byung ni /
translated: The origin of suffering is the cause of suffering.

original: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu dag ste /🔽de dag gis yid 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu dag ste / de dag gis yid 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one turns away from impermanence, suffering, and its cause.

original: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dag gis sdug bsngal las yid 'byung la /
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dag gis sdug bsngal las yid 'byung la /
translated: One turns away from suffering through the aspects of impermanence and suffering.

original: rgyu dang / kun 'byung ba dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rkyen gyi rnam pa dag gis kun 'byung ba las yid byung ngo //
analyzed: rgyu dang / kun 'byung ba dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rkyen gyi rnam pa dag gis kun 'byung ba las yid byung ngo //
translated: One turns away from the origin of suffering through the aspects of cause, origin, strong generation, and condition.🔽The path is like a raft.

original: gzings lta bu zhes bya ba ni 'di la gzings dang 'dra ba yod pas de ni gzings lta bu'o //
analyzed: gzings lta bu zhes bya ba ni 'di la gzings dang 'dra ba yod pas de ni gzings lta bu'o //
translated: The path is like a raft because it is like a raft.

original: de'i dngos po ni gzings lta bu nyid de /
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni gzings lta bu nyid de /
translated: The state of being like a raft is the state of being like a raft.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba dang 'brel pas na lam ni gzings lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal ba dang 'brel pas na lam ni gzings lta bu'o //
translated: The path is like a raft because it is connected with crossing over the ocean of samsara.

original: ji ltar 'di la gzings dang 'dra ba yod pa ste ston pa ni dor bar byed pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'di la gzings dang 'dra ba yod pa ste ston pa ni dor bar byed pa yin pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: How is this like a ship? Because it is to be abandoned.

original: dper na gzings la brten nas chu bo rgal ba ni de la gnas pa ma yin zhing don byas zin te gzings 'dor ba de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: dper na gzings la brten nas chu bo rgal ba ni de la gnas pa ma yin zhing don byas zin te gzings 'dor ba de dang 'dra'o //
translated: For example, when one has crossed a river by relying on a ship, one does not remain in it, and having accomplished one’s purpose, one abandons the ship.

original: de dag las 'da' ba mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag las 'da' ba mngon du phyogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because they are directed to the transcendence of those.

original: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang / lam rnams las 'da' bar mngon du phyogs pa ni de dag las 'da' ba mngon du phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang / lam rnams las 'da' bar mngon du phyogs pa ni de dag las 'da' ba mngon du phyogs pa'o //
translated: The transcendence of suffering, origination, and the path is directed to the transcendence of those.

original: de'i dngos po ni de las 'da' bar mngon du phyogs pa nyid de de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de las 'da' bar mngon du phyogs pa nyid de de'i phyir ro //
translated: The state of that is the very direction to the transcendence of those.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is taught:

original: gang gi phyir mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa la mngon par mi dga' zhing de dag las 'da' bar mngon du phyogs pa ste de'i phyir smon pa med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa can gyi ting nge 'dzin ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa la mngon par mi dga' zhing de dag las 'da' bar mngon du phyogs pa ste de'i phyir smon pa med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Because the concentration that has the aspects of impermanence, etc. is not delighted with the truths of suffering, etc., and is directed toward transcending them, therefore it is called wishless.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because it is similar to nirvana.

original: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i bden pa dag gis 'dzin mod kyi /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i bden pa dag gis 'dzin mod kyi /
translated: Although it is grasped by the truths of suffering, etc. and emptiness and selflessness,

original: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa de la yid 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa de la yid 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not disgusted with the truth of suffering.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is similar to nirvana.

original: stong pa dang bdag med pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i yang mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: stong pa dang bdag med pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i yang mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: That emptiness and selflessness is also the characteristic of nirvana,

original: chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the general characteristic of all dharmas.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa stong pa dang bdag med par bzung bzhin pa las ni yid 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa stong pa dang bdag med par bzung bzhin pa las ni yid 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
translated: But one does not turn away from nirvana, which is taken as empty and selfless.

original: de'i phyir smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de dag gi rnam pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de dag gi rnam pa can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the concentration of wishlessness does not have those aspects.

original: stong pa nyid la sogs @367b pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid gcig pa rnams kyang rim pa bzhin du gnyen po dang dmigs pa dang bsam pa'i sgo nas gsum nyid du sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la sogs @367b pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid gcig pa rnams kyang rim pa bzhin du gnyen po dang dmigs pa dang bsam pa'i sgo nas gsum nyid du sgrub par byed de /
translated: The three concentrations of emptiness, etc., are established as being three in number by way of their opposites, objects, and intentions, respectively.

original: re zhig smon pa med pa ni bsam pa'i sgo nas srid pa gsum la smon pa med pa ste de la sogs pa dgu nyid du rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: re zhig smon pa med pa ni bsam pa'i sgo nas srid pa gsum la smon pa med pa ste de la sogs pa dgu nyid du rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The wishless concentration is established as being three in number by way of its intention, since it is the absence of wishes for the three realms, etc.

original: yang ci ltar 'phags pa'i lam la bsam pa'i sgo nas smon pa med ce na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar 'phags pa'i lam la bsam pa'i sgo nas smon pa med ce na /
translated: How is the noble path wishless by way of intention?

original: de yang srid pa la brten pa dang rag las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang srid pa la brten pa dang rag las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is based on and dependent on existence.

original: 'o na ji ltar sgom par byed ce na rig pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis sgrub par byed de /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar sgom par byed ce na rig pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis sgrub par byed de /
translated: How does one cultivate it? One cultivates it through the aspects of knowledge, etc.

original: des mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir de med par mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa med do //
analyzed: des mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir de med par mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa med do //
translated: Since it leads to nirvana, nirvana is not attained without it.

original: gzings lta bu nyid nges par dor bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir de las kyang yid 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: gzings lta bu nyid nges par dor bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir de las kyang yid 'byung bar byed do //
